control.description:
KoolListBox is advanced control that extends the standard html listbox to the max. It supports order item, transfer item to another listbox, drag-and-drop and many more.
Key Features:
  • Semantic Rendering for Minimal HTML
  • Simple PHP interface
  • Rich Client-side API
  • Highly customizable CSS styles and template
  • Drag and drop supported
  • Item re-order
  • Item transfering
  • Support checkbox
  • Support template
